cards.title: Nhanh Như Chớp
cards.description: Nhanh như chớp nhí là chương trình do Đài Truyền hình Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh và công ty D.I.D TV sản xuất, là phiên bản nhí của chương trình Nhanh như chớp hiện đang phát sóng trên kênh HTV7 của Đài Truyền hình Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]

cards.title: Patiala Babes
cards.description: Mini, a young girl, encourages her traditional mother, Babita, to realise her worth and fulfil her dreams. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]

cards.title: After School Club
cards.description: After School Club, often shortened to ASC, is a South Korean internet-based live-music request television talk show co-hosted by Park Jimin, Seungmin and Heejun. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]

cards.title: Big Stage
cards.description: New singing program from Astro. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]

cards.title: I Can See Your Voice (Malaysia)
cards.description: A local spin-off version from Korea's famous variety show. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]

cards.title: Music Bank
cards.description: Music Bank is a South Korean music program which airs every Friday at 17:00 KST on KBS2. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]

cards.title: The Return of Superman
cards.description: The Return of Superman is a South Korean reality-variety show that airs on KBS2. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]

cards.title: Gundam Build Fighters
cards.description: Gundam Build Fighters is a 2013 Japanese science fiction anime television series based on Sunrise's long-running Gundam franchise. [TV SHOW] [ANIME & CARTOONS]

cards.title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED
cards.description: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED is an anime series developed by Sunrise and directed by Mitsuo Fukuda. [TV SHOW] [ANIME & CARTOONS]

cards.title: Phim Hoạt Hình Khoảnh Khắc Kỳ Diệu 2018
cards.description: xem phim hoạt hình, hoạt hình, phim hoạt hình, hoạt hình giải trí, phim hoạt hình hay nhất, tổng hợp phim hoạt hình, phim hay, hoạt hình hay, phim hoạt hình hay, hoạt hình việt nam, phim hoạt hình việt nam, phim, hoạt, hình, hay, nhất, 2018, hoat hinh, phim hoat hinh, phim hoat hinh hay nhat, hoat hinh hay, phim hoat hinh hay, hoạt hình anime, tổng hợp phim, khoảnh khắc kỳ diệu. [TV SHOW] [CARTOONS]

cards.title: Chhota Bheem
cards.description: Dholakpur is know for many things: a mighty and benevolent king, fun and big hearted cities and undoubtedly the most scrumptions laddoos. But no tale of Dholakpur is complete without its very own little hero: Chhota Bheem! Young as he may be, Bheem is strong and very smart. Along with his friends, he loves to help in need! Watch Bheem and his friends, Chutki, Raju, Jaggu, Kalia and Dholu-Bholu as they enjoy, explore and protect the sunshine-filled village of Dholakpur. [TV SHOW] [CARTOONS] [HINDI]

cards.title: Mr Bean the Animated Series
cards.description: Following the animated adventures of the clueless yet brilliant Mr Bean and his faithful sidekick Teddy. [TV SHOW] [ANIME & CARTOONS]

cards.title: Tom & Jerry
cards.description: Centers on a rivalry between its two title characters, Tom, a cat, and Jerry, a mouse. [TV SHOW] [ANIME & CARTOONS]

cards.title: Upin & Ipin
cards.description: Curious and fun-loving 5-year-old twin brothers Upin and Ipin learn and explore new things. [TV SHOW] [ANIME & CARTOONS]
